settings.title: Settings
settings.facebookPurchaseEventHelp: Choose how purchase events are sent to Facebook
settings.sendAddToCartEventsHelp: Track when customers add items to their cart
settings.sendAddPaymentInfoEventsHelp: Track when customers enter payment information
settings.disableAllTrackingHelp: This will disable all pixel events sent by the app across all platforms

helpText.facebook: Find your Pixel ID in Facebook Events Manager
helpText.googleAnalytics: Your GA4 Measurement ID from Google Analytics
helpText.tiktok: Find your Pixel ID in TikTok Events Manager
helpText.snapchat: Your Snap Pixel ID from Snapchat Ads Manager
helpText.pinterest: Your Pinterest Tag ID from Pinterest Business
helpText.sharechat: Your ShareChat Pixel ID from ShareChat Ads Manager
helpText.taboola: Your Taboola Pixel ID from Taboola Ads
helpText.kwai: Your Kwai Pixel ID from Kwai Ads Manager

validation.facebook: Facebook Pixel ID should be 15-16 digits
validation.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics ID should start with 'G-' followed by 10 characters
validation.tiktok: TikTok Pixel ID should start with 'C' followed by alphanumeric characters
validation.snapchat: Snapchat Pixel ID should be in UUID format
